verification_guide.semantic_html: Verify proper use of header, nav, main, article, section, aside, footer elements. Avoid div/span when semantic elements are available
verification_guide.aria_attributes: Verify aria-label for unlabeled interactive elements, aria-describedby for help text, aria-live for dynamic content, aria-hidden for decorative elements, proper role attributes
verification_guide.keyboard_navigation: Test all interactive elements are reachable via Tab, Enter/Space activate buttons/links, Escape closes modals, Arrow keys navigate menus/tabs, no keyboard traps
verification_guide.focus_management: Verify focus indicators are visible (outline or focus ring), focus order is logical (follows visual order), focus returns appropriately after modal close, skip links are available
verification_guide.color_contrast: Verify text contrast meets WCAG AA (4.5:1 for normal text, 3:1 for large text), UI components have sufficient contrast, focus indicators are visible against backgrounds
verification_guide.form_accessibility: Verify all inputs have associated labels (htmlFor/id), error messages are announced via aria-describedby, required fields are marked with aria-required, validation feedback is clear and timely
verification_guide.image_alt_text: Verify all images have alt text, decorative images have empty alt='', images with text include that text in alt, complex images have detailed descriptions
verification_guide.screen_reader: Test with VoiceOver (macOS/iOS) or NVDA (Windows), verify content is announced correctly, interactive elements are identified, form labels are read, error messages are announced
verification_guide.responsive_accessibility: Verify touch targets are at least 44x44px, mobile keyboard navigation works, viewport zoom up to 200% maintains functionality, mobile screen readers work correctly
verification_guide.language: Verify all response text is in Korean, check error messages and comments are in Korean
